unnormalised: Heard of checking restaurant reviews before ordering a plate of butter chicken? Well, now it's happening with homes too! Builder Reviews are becoming the "it" thing in Real Estate & Property.
normalised: Heard of checking restaurant reviews before ordering a plate of butter chicken? Well, now it is happening with homes too! Builder Reviews are becoming the "it" thing in Real Estate and Property.

unnormalised: Think of it as Zomato, but for your future 2BHK in Powai. Websites and apps are popping up where folks like Mrs. Sharma can share their experiences with builders. Did Mr. Patel from 'XYZ Constructions' actually deliver on his promise of a clubhouse? Was the carpet area really 800 sq ft like they said? These are the questions being answered.
normalised: Think of it as Zomato, but for your future two B H K in Powai. Websites and apps are popping up where folks like Missus Sharma can share their experiences with builders. Did Mister Patel from 'X Y Z Constructions' actually deliver on his promise of a clubhouse? Was the carpet area really eight hundred square feet like they said? These are the questions being answered.

unnormalised: It's a big deal, especially with RERA aiming for transparency. Imagine saving your hard-earned Rs. 50 Lakhs+ based on honest feedback. Even Dr. Iyer from IIM Ahmedabad says it's a game changer. This new trend empowers homebuyers to make informed decisions, pushing builders to up their game. Watch out, unethical builders – your days are numbered! From Gurgaon to Guwahati, Builder Reviews are here to stay.
